Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Notice>You do not have enough zonaite. Please
come again when you have the amount
I require.
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Notice>Oh? You have no room in your belongings.
Create space for the item I want to
provide and come again.
Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Apologies. We are out of inventory for
this item. I cannot exchange for it until
more are produced.
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>This exchange is complete.<sp:0:4:0>Ah. I seem to have reached the limits of
my inventory. Further exchanges must
wait until production catches up.
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I am a smithing construct. Mineru created
me to try to unlock the hidden potential
of Zonai charges.<sp:0:4:0>I was made with the unique ability
to temper zonaite for weapons and
equipment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I was driven into hiding when a minion
of the Demon King occupied the
Spirit Temple.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But you and Mineru have cleared the way.
I can perform my work once again.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>You have my wholehearted thanks.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I would ordinarily not work for anyone
other than Mineru.<sp:0:4:0>But you are a special case.<sp:0:4:0>I will gladly exchange my special weapons
and equipment with you. It will be up to
you to provide the zonaite.
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal>There is a slight issue. I have reached the
limits of my inventory.<sp:0:4:0>Would you like to review what I am
theoretically capable of exchanging?
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Welcome. Mineru has formally directed me
to provide you with my finest work.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I will gladly exchange my special weapons
and equipment with you. It will be up to
you to provide the zonaite.
Talk_018: <sp:3:0:2:0701>This is the catalog of what I can exchange.
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Do you have zonaite for me?<sp:0:4:0>I will gladly exchange my special weapons
and equipment with you. But it is up to
you to provide the zonaite.
Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This exchange is complete. Would you like
anything else?
Talk_007: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>You want to cancel this job? As you wish.
